entry.title: Combined summary - MacWallet - another wallet app for mac
entry.summary: MacWallet is a thin client wallet app for Mac OSX based on bitcoinj. Its main focus is to provide a small and integrated wallet for Mac OSX, with low memory and CPU footprint, that can run in the background without causing any inconvenience. The app uses Mac OSX keychain as a wallet store, which is encrypted by default with login credentials. Its user interface is simple and straightforward, with the status menu serving as the main entry point. Currently, MacWallet is in its early development stage. Screenshots of the app can be viewed on the Github page, and more information can be found on the bitcointalk post. The app is designed to have minimum impact on system resources and to be easy to use. Its aim is to provide a secure and convenient way to manage Bitcoin transactions. Overall, MacWallet offers a compact and lightweight option for users who want a wallet app that does not take up excessive system resources. The app's focus on simplicity and security makes it an attractive option for those who value these features in a wallet app. As the app is still in its early development stages, there may be further updates and improvements in the future.
